name: Escape the factory (SophieJu)
description:
In this steampunk stealth mini-game, you play a daring thief who has been hired to sneak into a large and heavily guarded steampunk factory. Your mission is to find the hidden vault and steal the valuable item hidden within. 

This is the first game I ever developed, and I made it in under a month for fun, so this is very beginner stuff. While constructive criticism is always appreciated, do not look at this like a professional project!

Commands : 

Move : WASD

Couch : left Ctrl

Skip intro : enter 

Pause : Escape

Install Instructions

  1. Download the file.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Launch the "steampunk stealth".exe
